hive_lesson.title: 1221 Treasure Hunt
hive_lesson.description: Hunting for treasure in the sea.

hive_text_custom.text: So, Peter, you mentioned treasure diving. How did you find out about this?
Oh, well, I had this friend and he actually used to work for the government but he was diving just for pleasure at that time but then he met, I think while on a diving
, he met another guy who was into
a company and they've actually become, I guess, professional treasure divers and it's, I think I mentioned about the

treasure around the tip of Africa because of the ancient sea route but I think my friends have now moved off to other parts of the world that are also known for sunken treasure spots. I think one of the areas are close to Florida in the United States because there used to be an ancient shipping route between Europe and the United States and, yeah, they go diving for treasure around that area.
There must be a lot of mysteries under the sea?
I think so too and I think it involves a lot of

possibly because it's, it can become a political issue I guess in some ways if the treasure is found and who does it belong to and the countries that originally sent the money or the gold or the treasure or the whatever and the country that it's found in now and also by the guys that find it. Is it finders keepers or is it a matter of dividing up the discovery and of course I think there's a lot of historical value involved with the find as well. So, yeah, I think it's an interesting, fascinating kind of adventure story.
It would be quite an adventurous hobby to have.
I think so too. Yeah, I kind of envy his lifestyle. He seems to go from one grand
in one very nice area of part of the world and goes to the next treasure area and yeah that's what he does for a living.

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 2) Where do they go diving for treasure?
3) Who may want rights to the treasure?

hive_text_custom.text: You mentioned that you like treasure diving.
'Treasure' is something that is valuable, like jewels,            gold, sculptures, etc. You go 'treasure diving' to look for            treasure in water. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
We actually took a boat out treasure diving on our              vacation.
 Have you ever tried treasure diving?

hive_text_custom.text: He and his friend formed a company for treasure diving.
When you 'form' a company, you start or create one. Notice            the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
She formed a support group for parents whose children              have developmental problems.
 He and his friends formed their own band in high school.

hive_text_custom.text: While he was on a diving excursion, he met another guy who            was in to treasure diving.
An 'excursion' is a short trip someplace, usually            involving some risk or physical activity. Notice the            following:

hive_vocab.examples:
They usually go on a bike excursion every summer.
 We are going on a hiking excursion in a few weeks.

hive_text_custom.text: My friends have moved to parts of the world that are known            for their sunken treasure spots.
Something 'sunken' is at the bottom of a lake, river or            sea. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
Sunken trees really make me nervous when I'm swimming.
 It's fun to scuba dive there, because there is a huge              sunken statue.

hive_text_custom.text: Mysteries under the sea involve a lot of dispute.
A 'dispute' is a conflict or argument. Notice the            following:

hive_vocab.examples:
Talking about politics with my family is a guaranteed              dispute.
 We already had a big dispute about this. I don't want to              talk about it again.

hive_text_custom.text: He seems to go from one grand yacht in a nice part of the            world to the next treasure area.
'Yachts' are large and luxurious boats used for traveling            on the ocean. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
They usually spend the winter months traveling around on              their yacht.
 We met a couple who offered to take us out fishing on              their yacht.

hive_text_custom.text: a reading club. Would you be interested in joining?

diving is a very popular tourist activity here.
